channel.title: Thinking Loud on Reflections
channel.description: Recent content in Thinking Loud on Reflections

item.title: What do I really want
item.description: The other day I watched a TED video where the presenter urged the audience to ask the question What do you really want? That got me thinking what do I really want. It is an interesting question to ask myself, since I have tried different roles and responsibilites - broad and deep - in the last couple of years. So I was pleasantly surprised when I found the book Data Structures and Algorithms in C++ by Adam Drozdek on my bookshelf.
